
{{alias}}
    Smallest positive single-precision floating-point normal number.

    The smallest positive single-precision floating-point normal number has the
    value `1/(2^(127-1))`, which corresponds to the bit sequence

    0 00000001 00000000000000000000000

    Examples
    --------
    > {{alias}}
    1.1754943508222875e-38

    See Also
    --------
